title: Teemo is disabled
body: QUICK TAKE CHAMPS THAT ARE COUNTERED BY HIM

> [{quoted}](name=TheMinez,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3Pybb5Zj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-13T14:38:43.323+0000)
>
> Singed beats riven in lore

2 soon

Hasn't it been that way for multiple seasons?
Singed made the gas that killed Riven's entire unit in the Noxus Ionia invasion.

Singed literally 1v5d and riven only survived cause of guardian angel.

Or plot armor, she borrowed it from gangplank and graves.

I like playing Soraka into Riven.
They flip out so much when they can't cheese. XD
Don't they just wreck you at level 3 and post 6? I really can't see this working out at all.

They wreck you at all levels if you fight.
If you're picking Soraka to fight, you're doing it wrong.
Goat has good wave clear, sustain, and riven has trouble turret diving with the silence.
If Riven roams, soraka has ult. She also has decent ambulance roams with her passive.
If Riven doesn't manage to snowball, she becomes useless. If Soraka loses lane, she's still effective mid game as long as she didn't feed.

Simply put: Riven wants to fight. Soraka doesn't have to.

If the other team's jungler wants to camp top to capitalize on the squishy support, it leaves bot lane wide open.

But it's toplane.. Riven can easily chase Soraka down. Also, it's easy for Riven to deny Soraka sustain and all she needs to do is dodge the slow. Soraka won't be able to lasthit with autoattacks if Riven freezes and once she tries to lasthit with her Q she will just continue the freeze and go oom quickly. And frankly, once Riven starts snowballing Soraka has no tools of surviving. Her silence is mildly inconvenient at best and she won't get off a second Q before she is dead.

>Also, it's easy for Riven to deny Soraka sustain and all she needs to do is dodge the slow.  

11.5 mana regen at lvl 1.
{{item:3028}} brings her up to 8.25 lvl 1 health regen, putting her at the 29th highest at lvl 1.
Non-tanks/juggernauts/bruisers above her: Akali (8.34), Talon (8.51), and shaco (8.37), Nocturne (8.26), Kayle (8.26).

>Soraka won't be able to lasthit with autoattacks if Riven freezes and once she tries to lasthit with her Q she will just continue the freeze and go oom quickly. 

You assume Soraka can't control the wave at all.

> And frankly, once Riven starts snowballing Soraka has no tools of surviving. 

You're missing the point. Riven Has to fight, because she's useless if she doesn't snowball.
Soraka doesn't even have to win lane. She's designed to be effective on little-to-no gold.
If the the enemy jungler decides to camp Soraka so Riven *can* snowball, they're leaving bot lane exposed. Assuming your team is half-coordinated, you can still pull out a net-win.
And all things being equal, Soraka has more team presence with jungler/mid heals and ult.

Sorry man, Soraka has 0 defensive stats and her silence is not enough to prevent Riven from simply tower diving her. If it works for you then great, but I amm 100% sure that a decent Riven would absolutely stomp Soraka.
DIE DIE DIE RIVEN MAINS!
i expect alot of nasus and tryndamere players

... Nasus counters Teemo though.

http://champion.gg/matchup/Teemo/Nasus/Top

This is the most overrated matchup in the whole game - Nasus W is way more crippling for Teemo than Teemo Q is for Nasus (add to that the fact that you ought to max E as Nasus in this matchup and Teemo stands no chance).

Trynda on the other hand is countered by nearly everything, so who cares? xD
And don't forget once you get merc treads and spectre's cowl you can just waltz up to Teemo and pimp cane him back to fountain.
Yeah. I kinda wonder where did myth that Teemo counters Nasus came from. Maybe back from times when Nasus was quite bad. :P

This is in Gameplay forum so I'ma just tell you that Teemo isn't that good and doesn't actually counter much match-ups. If you want a range top laner that generally performs better you want Jayce and Kennen.

last time i checked tilt is still everyone's counter. 
and when you press that lvl 7 emote when you kill em. they get pissed.

Counter doesn't always mean insta-win. Try playing {{champion:92}} into Teemo. It's annoying until around 4 or 5 when you can all in and especially at 6 when you can kill him in one rotation of spells + {{summoner:14}} but he's annoying as hell and his ult can be dangerous since you have low regen.
